title: 10 MIN LOVE HANDLES AND LOWER BELLY FAT WORKOUT Standing Only | No Equipment!
description:
Do you want to get rid of your love handles and belly fat? Then this standing workout is for you! The BEST approach to lose love handles and belly fat is with a workout that trains your obliques, lower belly, glutes, outer thighs and combine it with cardio! That's exactly what we are doing in this standing only workout!

Did you do this workout? Comment below!

I recommend you do to this short workout daily for 2 weeks to see amazing results! 

This workout is also great during pregnancy and postpartum.

Follow me on instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/fit.with.sally

Join my fitness program BUILD & BURN:
https://train.fit-with-sally.com/products/build-burn-fitness-program

Get my Meal Plan & Recipe Guide:
https://train.fit-with-sally.com/products/meal-plan-recipe-guide

00:00 Intro
00:31 Side Crunch
01:54 Squat Side Bend
02:34 Push-Away
03:15 Side Leg Raise
04:36 Skiers + Floor Touch
05:17 Side Punch
05:58 Curtsy Lunge To Crunch
07:19 Squat To Toe Touch
07:58 Reach Over
09:17 Squat To Side Crunch

The songs in this video are from Epidemic Sound:
Song 1: Sleeping in my Head from Siine feat. Frank Moody
Song 2: Name Tag from Nivicious feat. AdamAlexander
Song 3: If your're looking for trouble from Basixx feat. TASH
Song 4: Let's Stay Up All Night from Basixx feat. Frigga

DISCLAIMER:  The information in this video is not intended to take the place of medical advice from your healthcare provider.  Viewers are strongly advised to consult with their doctor or other healthcare provider before undertaking any exercise or exercise program demonstrated in this video. Any application of the recommendations provided in this video is at the viewer's discretion and sole risk.
channelDescription:
Subscribe to get strong, fit, and confident with my at home workouts!

Hi, I am Sally, certified fitness instructor and a mom of 2! My passion is to help other women feel strong, confident, and healthy so you can flourish in everyday life. 
Subscribe to join the tribe!

embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/bxUB6WNcSEU" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: You guys are LOVING this workout and seeing amazing results! SO, I decided to create a new version of the LOVE HANDLES WORKOUT that is 15 MINUTES long (instead of 10 minutes). Same movements but a few more! If you are ready for the next step, here it is: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Udcvhi4m0pQ

Just an update for everyone, I started doing this 2 weeks ago and I've lost atleast 2 inches off my waist, with a visibly flatter belly than before! (no diet whatsoever)
Keep going guys, it's a really effective workout.
Did this for 4months almost every day and lost most of my stubborn belly fat plus love handles ..moving in to the 15 min standup ..really enjoy doing it

Did this workout for 2 weeks straight and definitely see great results! No changes on the scale but I feel a difference in my stomach and back area. I see definition and feel so much slimmer!! Definitely doing this everyday

I did this workout every day for the last 14 days and lost 2 inches around my tummy. I did not change my eating habits and did not lose weight - so the inches off definitely came from the workout. I want to try some of Sally's other workouts too. Excited to see measurable results so quickly. Thank you, Sally!
